content: how much does it take (in general) to compile mathlib from scratch? Is there any parallelism one could employ?

This depends on your hardware setup. There are machines that compile mathlib in < 20 mins, and others need 1h30.
A lot of parallelism is already employed by compiling multiple files at the same time.
It took roughly 18mins to build on my machine.
What are the specs, out of interest?
It is a huge machine with AMD 7773X (64c128t), 128G RAM.
